devdoc.details: 提供与地址相关的工具函数，包括判断一个地址是否为合约地址。

evm.assembly:
/* "contracts/IERC1155/Address.sol":167:5905  library Address {... */
  dataSize(sub_0)
  dataOffset(sub_0)
  0x0b
  dup3
  dup3
  dup3
  codecopy
  dup1
  mload
  0x00
  byte
  0x73
  eq
  tag_1
  jumpi
  mstore(0x00, 0x4e487b7100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000)
  mstore(0x04, 0x00)
  revert(0x00, 0x24)
tag_1:
  mstore(0x00, address)
  0x73
  dup2
  mstore8
  dup3
  dup2
  return
stop

sub_0: assembly {
        /* "contracts/IERC1155/Address.sol":167:5905  library Address {... */
      eq(address, deployTimeAddress())
      mstore(0x40, 0x80)
      0x00
      dup1
      revert

    auxdata: 0xa264697066735822122011fdc55a52e4f494daadf64ba910079bc838bf3ce1498adef674ecded0f07bac64736f6c634300081a0033
}
